issue.title: [Plasma] Plasma C++ and Python integration test for tensors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3159](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3159). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is motivated by ARROW-3127, we should have an integration test for this to make sure it won't break in the future.
